column5: Hey  I was cleaning out the garage today and came across 3 rods that had no upper parts to them.  I broke them last year and kept the bottom part.  Does anybody know of a site or place that has the upper part of the rods in stock or for sale, or better yet, does anybody have them kicking around  the are  1 shimano izumi series mh 7ft spinning 1 shimano izumi series 10 6 spinning 1 berkely lighting rod 6 6 spinning  not the greatest rods but if i can find the tops for these then they are good backups.  thanks  Anders
not worth the effort imo. the chances of someone having those spare tips are slim
Try A. Aikman in Mississauga  Aikman A Sporting Goods RepairPhone :(905) 277-3595 Fax (905) 277-0088 Address : 3010 Novar Rd   Mississauga GTA , ON , L5B1S4  Joey
The Berkley rod you are probably toast, but you might want to call Shimano in Peterborough 705-745-3232 about the other two. Garry2R's
thanks for the ptbo number I was just lookin for that!
